site.name: CosmeticLens
site.description: Analyze cosmetic ingredients and discover what's really in your skincare products

home.hero_title: Know What's Really in Your Skincare
home.hero_subtitle: Analyze ingredient lists, compare marketing claims to reality, and find affordable alternatives
home.feature_1_desc: Paste any product's ingredient list and get a detailed breakdown of what each ingredient does
home.feature_2_desc: See which marketing claims are supported by actual ingredients—and which are just hype
home.feature_3_desc: Discover affordable alternatives with similar formulations to expensive products
home.feature_4_desc: Get recommendations based on your skin type, concerns, and sensitivities
home.step_1: Enter a product name or paste the ingredient list
home.step_2: Our AI analyzes each ingredient for efficacy and safety
home.step_3: Get a clear breakdown with personalized recommendations

footer.about_text: CosmeticLens helps you understand what's really in your skincare products. We believe in evidence-based information and transparent ingredient analysis.
footer.disclaimer_text: This tool provides educational information only, not medical or dermatological advice. Always patch test new products and consult a dermatologist for skin conditions.
